title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description:
Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set color or background color to orange.
OB: When setting the color or background color of a report item to orange, the item is not displayed in orange.
EB:
Preview.Expected result: The report item should be displayed in orange.
Actual result: The report item is not displayed in orange.
SR:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color of the item to orange.
3. Preview the report and verify that the item is displayed in orange.
